api_list.name: Favourite Champs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-odds.p.rapidapi.com/Prelive/api/Prelive/GetFavouriteChamps?skinId=wplay&lang=es-ES"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Prelive Menu.
api_list.description: Get the data of Prelive Matches.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-odds.p.rapidapi.com/Prelive/api/Prelive/GetSportMenu?dateFilter=&sportType=&skinId=wplay&timeZoneOffset=300&lang=es-ES"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
